### Opening pdf in new tab

::: callout-note
**Firefox users:**
Opening PDFs in a new tab depends on your browser setting:
*Settings → Applications → Portable Document Format (PDF) → Open in Firefox*
:::

[Open slides](../pdf/example.pdf){target="_blank"}

### How to embed a pdf

Embedding a PDF with html code:

```{=html}
<embed src="../pdf/example.pdf"
       type="application/pdf"
       width="100%"
       height="400px">
```
